nodes.html: Showcase website made with Wordpress for a Pizzeria with contact forms and embedded Google map, online menu and daily announcements.
Participation in the AWS day, a day in which Amazon collaborators presented us the proposed features. At the end of the day, I realized a youtube-like serverless Web application.
PGI refactoring and creation of a content management system for the redesign of the "Flore Laurentienne"'s website, management of the company's network.
Creation of a new three-tier architecture for BBj, a Java-based language, with React components. Project management has been carried out with agile methods.

Contribution to the Porphyry website : creation of automated tests with Ruby and Cucumber, implementation of features with React and configuration of Travis continuous integration. Project management has been performed using agile methods.
Creation and development of the backend and the database of a professional stock exchange platform for professionals.
Creation of our own fullstack Web application, offering parking spaces at the airport, with the model of TravelCar.

react-boilerplate is a React starter pack. It is a simple alternative to create-react-app. react-boilerplate uses Webpack, Babel and PostCSS. It supports many formats like html, js, jsx, css and others.
Web application generating guided tours according to factors (location, weather, time available, ...). Realization of our own REST API and a React client.

Creation of a SaaS Marketing platform and management of data pipelines. Creation, deployment and monitoring, and continuous integration of micro-services. SQL and NoSQL databases monitoring (Mongo & Neo4J). Deployment and production with cloud providers.
